attributes.action: prevent the fluoridisation of our water supply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has been billed as a method of reducing tooth decay and thus is a form of medical intervention. If the water supply of the entire nation was fluoridised this would result in forced acceptance of medical treatment which is in conflict with our right to refuse medical treatment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
